```{r}
# Install and load the 'countrycode' package
#install.packages("countrycode")
#library(countrycode)


iso3166ToCountryFullName <- function(countryNameInIso) {
  iso_codes <- countryNameInIso

  return(countrycode(sourcevar = iso_codes, origin = "iso2c", destination = "country.name"))
}

df$employee_residence = iso3166ToCountryFullName(df$employee_residence)

df$company_location = iso3166ToCountryFullName(df$company_location)

write.csv(df, "exploratoryDELETE.csv", row.names=FALSE)

```
